Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 21st overall pick, by Baltimore in 2016...
Traded from Baltimore to San Diego on 3/2/2017 (Going to SDN: P R. Guillaume, 2B R. Stephenson Jr., P M. Varada, P B. Myers. Going to BAL: P J. Axford)...
Injured on 4/11/2018 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Stuart Pomeranz (LAN)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/2019, off Ronald Maag (SF)...
Injured on 6/7/2020 with a Strained Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Released by San Diego on 6/12/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 6/12/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Had 6 hits with 1 RBI against Los Angeles (N) on 9/28/2021...
